1 /**
  2  * This namespace defines utility functions used within library clasees
  3  * @namespace
  4  * @name py.utils
  5  */
  6 (function($NS, $Global){
  7 	
  8 	var toString = Object.prototype.toString,
  9 		checkFor = {
 10 		'Function': 1,
 11 		'Undefined': 1,
 12 		'Null': 1,
 13 		'String': 1,
 14 		'Array': 1,
 15 		'Object': 1,
 16 		'Math': 1,
 17 		'Date': 1,
 18 		'Boolean': 1,
 19 		'Number': 1,
 20 		'RegExp': 1,
 21 		'JSON': 1,
 22 		'Arguments': 1
 23 	},
 24 	check = {}, 
 25 	key;
 26 	
 27 	//create s list of type checkers
 28 	function createChecker(objectType){
 29 		var typeString = ["[object ", objectType, "]"].join("");
 30 		return function(object){
 31 			return toString.call(object) === typeString;
 32 		};
 33 	}
 34 
 35 	for(key in checkFor){
 36 		if(checkFor.hasOwnProperty(key)){
 37 			check["is" + key] = createChecker(key);
 38 		}
 39 	}
 40 	
 41 	//create utils 
 42 	(function(){
 43 		
 44 		var isArray = check.isArray,
 45 			isObject = check.isObject,
 46 			isUndefined = check.isUndefined;
 47 		
 48 		function getType(object){
 49 			var stringified = toString.call(object);
 50 			return stringified.substring(8,stringified.length-1);
 51 		}
 52 		
 53 		function createNS(namespace, apply){
 54 			var ns = namespace.split('.'),
 55 				nsPart = ns.shift(),
 56 				targetObject = $Global; //this needs to refer to global
 57 			
 58 			while(nsPart){
 59 				if(!targetObject[nsPart]){
 60 					targetObject[nsPart] = {};
 61 				}
 62 				
 63 				if(ns.length === 0 && apply){
 64 					targetObject[nsPart] = apply;
 65 				}
 66 				
 67 				targetObject = targetObject[nsPart];	
 68 				nsPart = ns.shift();
 69 			}
 70 			
 71 			return targetObject;
 72 		}	
 73 		
 74 		function extend(construct, parent){
 75 	        var Extends = function(){};
 76 	        Extends.prototype = parent.prototype;
 77 	        construct.prototype = new Extends();
 78 	        construct.prototype._parent = parent.prototype;
 79 	    }
 80 	    
 81 	    function mixin(target, source){
 82 	        var key,
 83 	            i,
 84 	            l;
 85 	        if(target && source){
 86 				if(isArray(source)){
 87 		            for(i=0, l=source.length; i<l; i++){
 88 		                mixin(target, source[i]);
 89 		            }
 90 		        }else{
 91 		            for(key in source){
 92 		                if(source.hasOwnProperty(key)){
 93 		                    target[key] = source[key];
 94 		                }
 95 		            }
 96 		        }
 97 		        
 98 		        return target;
 99 	        }    
100 	    }
101 	    
102 	    function isImplementing(target, implement){
103 			var targetProperty, 
104 				key, 
105 				i, 
106 				l;
107 			
108 			if (isArray(implement)) {
109 				for ( i = 0, l = implement.length; i < l; i++) {
110 					if (!isImplementing(target, implement[i])) {
111 						return false;
112 					}
113 				}
114 				
115 				return true;
116 			
117 			} else if (isObject(implement)) {
118 				for (key in implement) {
119 					if(implement.hasOwnProperty(key)){
120 						targetProperty = target[key];
121 						if (isUndefined(targetProperty) || getType(targetProperty) !== getType(implement[key])) {
122 							return false;
123 						}
124 					}
125 				}
126 
127 				return true;
128 			}
129 	    }
130 	    
131 	    function pairCall(fn, pairArgs, context){
132 	        var key;
133 	            
134 	        if(check.isFunction(fn) && check.isObject(pairArgs)){
135 	            for(key in pairArgs){
136 	                if(pairArgs.hasOwnProperty(key)){
137 	                    fn.call(context, key, pairArgs[key]);
138 	                }
139 	            }
140 	            return true;
141 	        }
142 	        
143 	        return false;
144 	    }
145 	    
146 	    function isDefined(object){
147 			return !check.isNull(object) && !check.isUndefined(object);
148 	    }
149 		
150 		$NS.patternUtils = mixin(check ,{
151 			createNS: createNS,
152 			extend: extend,
153 			mixin: mixin,
154 			pairCall: pairCall,
155 			isImplementing: isImplementing,
156 			isDefined: isDefined,
157 			getType: getType
158 		});
159 		
160 	}());	
161 }(patternity, this));
162
